nodes.bodyText: can we move preference settings to the preference manager?
you'd expect the settings to be updated after the server starts (onDidChangeConfiguration)
java.format.insertSpaces would be more consistent IMO
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -57,6 +57,14 @@
 	 * Specifies the folder path to the JDK .
 	 */
 	public static final String JAVA_HOME = "java.home";
+	/**
+	 * Insert spaces when pressing Tab
+	 */
+	public static final String JAVA_CONFIGURATION_INSERTSPACES = "java.editor.insertSpaces";

nodes.bodyText: java.format. tabSize would be more consistent IMO

nodes.bodyText: why? Might show that tests are brittle, which would not be a good reason to set inconsistent value
then the tests should set the default to tab
